bibdata.title: IEEE Guide for Medical Ultrasound Field Parameter Measurements
IEEE Guide for Medical Ultrasound Field Parameter Measurements

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This IEEE standard describes procedures for measuring medical ultrasound field parameters such as pressure, power and intensity. It is intended for use by persons involved in measurement of acoustic fields produced by medical ultrasound instruments.<>

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
